title: Almas (Capelas das)
body:
In the parish of Ribeira Brava, in a location that is now unknown, the cooper Antonio Rodrigues Jardim founded a small chapel dedicated to the Souls of Purgatory in the year 1652.

In the location of Vargem in the parish of Estreito de Câmara de Lobos, there is a chapel with the same invocation, but the founder and year of construction are unknown.

There is a chapel of Almas in the parish of Calheta, with no further details known about it.

Around 1710, the people built a small chapel of Almas in the churchyard of the parish church of Estreito de Câmara de Lobos, which was later demolished.

Adjacent to the parish church of Ponta do Sol, a chapel of the same invocation was built, which was ordered to be demolished by the Municipal Council around 1925 to widen the street of Dr. João Augusto Teixeira.

1652: Foundation of the chapel dedicated to the Souls of Purgatory by Antonio Rodrigues Jardim
1710: Construction of a small chapel of Almas in the churchyard of the parish church of Estreito de Câmara de Lobos
1925: Demolition of the chapel of the same invocation adjacent to the parish church of Ponta do Sol
